title: MTUM, DIS, AMT, ABT: Large Outflows Detected at ETF - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the iShares Edge MSCI USA Momentum Factor ETF (Symbol: MTUM) where we have detected an approximate $67.0 million dollar outflow -- that's a 0.6% decrease week over week (from 87,500,000 to 86,950,000). Among the largest underlying components of MTUM, in trading today Walt Disney Co. (Symbol: DIS) is up about 0.6%, American Tower Corp (Symbol: AMT) is off about 1.5%, and Abbott Laboratories (Symbol: ABT) is up by about 1%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the MTUM Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of MTUM, versus its 200 day moving average:
